system.effect: With a mighty bang the arm is blasted from the target's body, killing the target instantly in a rain of blood droplets. In addition, if the target was carrying a weapon with a power source in his hand (such as a power sword or chainsword), then it violently explodes, inflicting a single hit for [[1d10+5]] Impact damage to a randomly determined Hit Location upon each target to anyone within two metres.
